trg_text: The MRM is mandated to facilitate, encourage and coordinate the programme that seeks to restore the moral fibre of our societ This movement seeks to revive the spirit of Ubuntu/Botho using both government and civil-society resourceCabinet approved the three-year operational programme of the MRM and a phased approach of mainstreaming the moral regeneration programme within governmen Cabinet approved that South Africa submits its bid to host the 2023 Rugby World Cup (RWC).

trg_text: This will once again afford South Africa an opportunity to showcase the country to the international communit South Africa has previously hosted world-class events such as the All Africa Games, Cricket World Cup, 2010 FIFA World Cup and many international conference As the country we have learnt from these past experiences particularly the costs overruns and collusion which accompanied 2010.

trg_text: Phase I (2017) for publication in the Government Gazette for public commentThis responds to the National Development Plan s call for greater emphasis on innovation, improved productivity, more intense pursuit of a knowledge economy, and better exploitation of comparative and competitive advantageThe IP Policy is an important policy instrument in promoting innovation, technology transfer, research and development, creative expression, consumer protection, industrial development and more broadly, economic growt Cabinet approved the Draft Green Transport Strategy to be published for public comment This strategy will form the cornerstone of policy development within the transport sector regarding the lowering of the GHG emission The aim of this strategy is to minimize the adverse impact of transport on the environment while addressing current and future transport demands based on sustainable development principleTransport systems form the backbone of South Africa s socio-economic activities by enabling the movement of people and good However, emissions from the transport sector account for 1 of the country s total greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, with road transport being responsible for 9 of these GHG emission South Africa has pledged a GHG emissions reduction target of 34% by 2020 and 42% by 2026.

trg_text: The Minister of Home Affairs, Prof Hlengiwe Mkhize, will hold a separate briefing to explain the conditions and the process to be followed once the reapplication open Cabinet approved the South African Mint Company s designs for the 2017 commemorative colour coins series: Flowers and Birds of the Cape West Coast Biosphere Reserv This is an addition to the commemorative and circulation coin ranges to be issued in 201 Bills Cabinet approved publication of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2017 for public comment It amends the Deeds Registries Act, 1937 (Act 47 of 1937), so as to improve and enhance application and implementation of the Ac The Bill will also streamline and enhance the administration and registration of deeds Condolences Cabinet expressed its condolences to the families of the two soccer fans who lost their lives during the stampede at the FNB Stadium on Saturday, 29 July 2017.

trg_text: Cabinet approved that the Department of Home Affairs can reopen the reapplication process for the current Zimbabwean Special Permit holders, under certain condition The initial Special Dispensation for Zimbabweans was approved in April 2009 to document Zimbabwean nationals who were in South Africa illegall Their permits expire on the 31 December 2017.

src_text: IMC e tla laola Tshepedi o ya phenkgi ano ya RWC 2023 le go netefat a gore naga e holega go t a ekonomi mo tiragalong y Tona ya Dipapadi le Boitapolo o, Morena Thulas Nxesi, o tla swara seboka sa baga i ba ditaba seo se aroganego go ba sedimo a ka ga tshepedi o ya phenkgi an Kabinete e dumelet e gore Sethalwa sa Molawana wa Thoto ya Bohlale (IP) sa Afrika Borwa
trg_text: President Jacob Zuma has constituted a Ministerial Committee of Enquiry, headed by Minister Nxesi, to investigate the circumstances that led to this traged 4.

src_text: Kgato ya I (2017) se phatlalat we ka gare ga Kuranta ya Mmu o gore set haba se dire ditshwaotshwao ka ga sonSe se fetola boipilet o bja Leanotlhabollo la Boset haba la kgatelelo ye kgolo go boitlhamelo, t welet o ye e kaonafet ego, t halomorago ye kgolo ya ekonomi ye e nago le tsebo, le kutollo ye kaone ya dibaka t eo di bapet wago le t a bokgonMolawana wa IP ke sediri wa se bohlokwa sa melawana seo se t wet ago pele boitlhamelo, pheti et o ya theknolot i, dinyaki i o le tlhabollo, tlhagi o ye e nago le boithomelo, t hirelet o ya badiri i, tlhabollo ya diintasteri le ka kakaret o, kgolo ya ekonom Kabinete e dumelet e gore Sethalwa sa Leano la Dinamelwa go Tikologo se phatlalat we gore set haba se dire ditshwaotshwao ka ga son Leano le le tla bopa motheo wa tlhabollo ya melawana ka gare ga lekala la dinamelwa mabapi le go fokot a me i ya Digase t a Lefaufaung (GHG).Maikemi et o a leano le ke go fokot a seabe se
trg_text: Cabinet met at the Sefako M Makgatho Presidential Guesthouse in Pretoria on Tuesday, 1 August 201 Cabinet Decisions

src_text: oro sa nyakego ya dinamelwa go tikologo mola ka go le lengwe re rarolla dinyakego t a dinamelwa mo lebakeng le le ka moso go lebelet we melawana ya tlhabollo ya go ya go ilMananeo a dinamelwa a bopa motheo wa ditiragalo t a ekonomi ya set haba ka Afrika Borwa ka go kgont ha go sepet wa ga batho le dithot Le ge go le bjale, me i ye e t wago ka lekaleng la dinamelwa e bopa 1 ya palomoka ya me i ya GHG ka mo nageng, mola e le gore dinamelwa t a tseleng di rwele maikarabelo go 9 ya me i ye ya GH Afrika Borwa e tshephi it e gore e tla tsenya letsogo go nepi ong ya phokot o ya me i ya GHG ka 34% ka 2020 le ka 42% ka 2026.

src_text: Kabinete e dumelet e gore Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae e bule leswa tshepedi o ya dikgopelo go bao mo lebakeng le ba swerego Phemiti ye e Kgethegilego ya Zimbabwe, ka fase ga maemo a it eg Tumelelo ya peleng ye e Kgethegilego ya badudi ba Zimbabwe e dumelet we ka Moranang 2009 go ngwadi a badudi ba Zimbabwe bao ba bego ba le ka Afrika ka ntle le mola Diphemiti t a bona di felelwa ke nako ka la 31 Manthole 2017.Tona ya Merero ya Selegae, Moprofesara Hlengiwe Mkhize, o tla swara tshedimo o ya baga i ba ditaba yeo e kgethegilego go hlalo a maemo le tshepedi o yeo e tlago latelwa ge dikgopelo t e diswa di bulelw Kabinete e dumelet e ditlhamo t a Khamphani ya T welet o ya Dit helete t a T hipi t a 2017 t a molokoloko wa dit helete t a t hipi t a mebala t a keteko: Mat oba le Dinonyana t a Bolotadiphedi bja Lebopo la Kapa Bodikel Se ke tlalelet o go mehutahuta ya dit helete t a t hipi t a keteko le t eo di phatlalat wago t eo di tlago abja ka 201 Melaokakanywa Kabinete e dumelet e go phatlalat wa ga Molaokakanywapheto wa wa Ngwadi o ya Mangwalo a Beng ba Dithoto wa 2017 gore set haba se dire ditshwaotshwao ka ga on O feto a Molao wa Ngwadi o ya Mangwalo a Beng ba Dithoto, wa 1937 (Molao wa 47 wa 1937), go realo e le go kaonafat a le go maatlafat a go tsenya tiri ong le go phethagat a Molao w Molaokakanywa wo o tla tsenya tiri ong le go maatlafat a taolo le ngwadi o ya mangwalo a beng ba dithoto Melaet a ya mahlokoKabinete e lebi it e mahloko a yona go ba lapa ba bathekgi ba babedi ba kgwele ya maoto bao ba lahleget wego ke maphelo a bona ka nakong ya mogatano ka Lepatlelong la FNB ka Mokibelo wa la 29 Mosegamanye 2017.
trg_text: Extension of the term of office of Ms Thabang Charlotte Christine Mampane as the Commissioner of the National Lotteries Commission (NLC).

src_text: Mopresidente o hlomile Komiti ya Dinyaki i o ye e bopilwego ke Ditona, yeo e etilwego pele ke Tona Nxesi, go nyaki i a mabaka ao a dirilego gore go be le masetlapelo a Bao ba thwet wego me omongBatho ka moka bao ba thwet wego me omong mangwalo a bona a dithuto a tla tii et wa le go netefalet wa ka malebMorena Lefentse Cuitzen Radikeledi o thwet we leswa bjalo ka moemedi wa Kgoro ya Dit helete ya Boset haba go Lekgotla la Koporase ya In orentshe ya Dikoloto t a Diromelwantle la Afrika Borwa SOC LimiteKatolo o ya lebaka la mo omo la Mohumagadi Thabang Charlotte Christine Mampane bjalo ka Mokhomi enare wa Khomi ene ya Dillotho ya Boset haba (NLC).Moprofesara Ntshengedzeni Alfred Nevhutanda o thwet we leswa bjalo ka Modulasetulo wa NLMohumagadi Fadila Ethne Lagadien bjalo ka leloko la Setheo sa Phatlalat o ya Dithu o t a Ma eleng go t a Bokgabo, Set o le Histori ya Boset haba, Tlhago, t a Set o le Bohlami bja Dipolane sa Lekgotla la NLMorena Sunrise Vusumuzi Mkhize bjalo ka Molaodipharephare (DG) wa Kgoro ya Bokgabo le Set Mohumagadi Thathakahle Jordan-Dyani bjalo ka Motlat a Molaodipharephare (DDG): Merero ya Bodit habat haba le Kgwebi ano ka go Theknolot i ya Tshedimo o le Dikgokagano (ICT) ka Kgorong ya Mananeokgoparara a Dikgokaganyo le Ditirelo t a PosGo thwala leswa le go thwalwa ga balaodi bao e sego ba khuduthamaga ba Lekgotla la Pankatlhabollo ya Borwa bja Afrika Borwa mo mengwageng ye meraro (go fihla ka la 31 Mosegamanye 2020):1 Mohumagadi Anuradha Singh (o thwet we leswa);2 Mohumagadi Gugu Mtetwa (o thwet we leswa);3 Moprofesara Mark Swilling (o thwet we leswa);4 Mohumagadi Zanele Monnakgotla (o thwet we);5 Morena Lufuno Motsherane (o thwet we);6 Mohumagadi Bulelwa Ndamase (o thwet we);7 Mohumagadi Pinkie Nqeto (o thwet we);8 Mohumagadi Letlhogonolo Meko (o thwet we); le9 Morena Blessing Mudavanhu (o thwet we);Go thwalwa le go thwala leswa ga balaodi bao e sego ba khuduthamaga ba Lekgotla la Koporasetlhabollo ya Set haba SOC Limited mo mengwageng ye meraro (go fihla ka la 31 Mosegamanye 2020):1 Ngaka Xolani H Mkhwanazi (Motlat amodulasetulo) (o thwet we);2 Mohumagadi Mathukana Mokoka (o thwet we);3 Mohumagadi Dudu Hlatshwayo (o thwet we leswa);4 Mohumagadi Sibusisiwe N Ngubane (o thwet we leswa); le5 Ngaka Trueman Goba (o thwet we leswa).Dipot i o:Mohumagadi Phumla Williams
